alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Crittenden; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:01PM CDT until June 16 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CRAIGHEAD...EASTERN POINSETT...SOUTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI AND NORTH CENTRAL CRITTENDEN COUNTIES... At 201 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tyronza, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Trumann, Marked Tree, Lepanto, Caraway, Tyronza, Joiner, Dyess, Bassett, Birdsong, Payneway, Whitton, Dimple, West Ridge, Tulot, Deckerville, Weona, Hatchie Coon, Dub, Maple Grove and Chelford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
